\newcommand{\ottrulehead}[3]{$#1$ & & $#2$ & & & \multicolumn{2}{l}{#3}}

\newcommand{\ottmetavars}{
\ottmetavartabular{

}}

\newcommand{\ottA}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{A}  ,\ \ottnt{B}  ,\ \ottnt{C}  ,\ \ottnt{E}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottmv{b}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \ottnt{A}  \odot  \ottnt{B} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \ottnt{A}  \sqcup  \ottnt{B} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{A}  \rhd  \ottnt{B}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{A}  \multimap  \ottnt{B}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{A}  \multimapboth  \ottnt{B}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  \ottnt{A}  \ottsym{)}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottT}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{T}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottmv{b}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \odot  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rhd  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \sqcup  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  \ottnt{T}  \ottsym{)}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottG}{
\ottrulehead{\Gamma  ,\ \Delta  ,\ \Theta  ,\ \Psi}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ \cdot }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{A}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \Gamma'}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottgrammar}{\ottgrammartabular{
\ottA\ottinterrule
\ottT\ottinterrule
\ottG\ottafterlastrule
}}

\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXvarName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_var}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXvar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
  \cdot  ; \ottmv{b}  \vdash  \ottmv{b} }{%
{\ottdruleTXXvarName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXvarCName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_varC}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXvarC}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \ottmv{b} ;  \cdot   \vdash  \ottmv{b} }{%
{\ottdruleTXXvarCName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXparaName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_para}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXpara}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}} ; \Delta_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \quad   \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} ; \Delta_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }%
}{
 \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} ; \Delta_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Delta_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash   \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \odot  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }{%
{\ottdruleTXXparaName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXseqName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_seq}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXseq}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}} ; \Delta_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \quad   \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} ; \Delta_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }%
}{
 \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} ; \Delta_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Delta_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rhd  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%
{\ottdruleTXXseqName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXchoiceName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_choice}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXchoice}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}} ; \Delta_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \quad   \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} ; \Delta_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }%
}{
 \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} ; \Delta_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Delta_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash   \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \sqcup  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }{%
{\ottdruleTXXchoiceName}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdruleEXXparaIName}[0]{\ottdrulename{E\_paraI}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleEXXparaI}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Theta_{{\mathrm{1}}} ; \Psi_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{E_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \quad   \Theta_{{\mathrm{2}}} ; \Psi_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{E_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }%
}{
 \Theta_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Theta_{{\mathrm{2}}} ; \Psi_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Psi_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash   \ottnt{E_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \odot  \ottnt{E_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }{%
{\ottdruleEXXparaIName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleEXXparaEName}[0]{\ottdrulename{E\_paraE}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleEXXparaE}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Theta_{{\mathrm{1}}} ; \Psi_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash   \ottnt{E_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \odot  \ottnt{E_{{\mathrm{2}}}}    \quad   \Theta_{{\mathrm{2}}} ; \Psi_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{E_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{E_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Psi_{{\mathrm{3}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{E_{{\mathrm{3}}}}  }%
}{
 \Theta_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Theta_{{\mathrm{2}}} ; \Psi_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Psi_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Psi_{{\mathrm{3}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{E_{{\mathrm{3}}}} }{%
{\ottdruleEXXparaEName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleEXXseqIName}[0]{\ottdrulename{E\_seqI}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleEXXseqI}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Theta_{{\mathrm{1}}} ; \Psi_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{E_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \quad   \Theta_{{\mathrm{2}}} ; \Psi_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{E_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }%
}{
 \Theta_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Theta_{{\mathrm{2}}} ; \Psi_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Psi_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{E_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rhd  \ottnt{E_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%
{\ottdruleEXXseqIName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleEXXseqEName}[0]{\ottdrulename{E\_seqE}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleEXXseqE}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Theta_{{\mathrm{2}}} ; \Psi_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{E_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rhd  \ottnt{E_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \quad   \Theta_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{E_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{E_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Theta_{{\mathrm{3}}} ; \Psi_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{E_{{\mathrm{3}}}}  }%
}{
 \Theta_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Theta_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Theta_{{\mathrm{3}}} ; \Psi_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Psi_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{E_{{\mathrm{3}}}} }{%
{\ottdruleEXXseqEName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleEXXexName}[0]{\ottdrulename{E\_ex}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleEXXex}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Theta ; \Psi_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{E_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{E_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Psi_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{E} }%
}{
 \Theta ; \Psi_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{E_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{E_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Psi_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{E} }{%
{\ottdruleEXXexName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleEXXchoiceName}[0]{\ottdrulename{E\_choice}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleEXXchoice}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Theta_{{\mathrm{1}}} ; \Psi_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{E_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \quad   \Theta_{{\mathrm{2}}} ; \Psi_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{E_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }%
}{
 \Theta_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Theta_{{\mathrm{2}}} ; \Psi_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Psi_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash   \ottnt{E_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \sqcup  \ottnt{E_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }{%
{\ottdruleEXXchoiceName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleEXXimpIName}[0]{\ottdrulename{E\_impI}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleEXXimpI}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Theta ; \Psi  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{E_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{E_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }%
}{
 \Theta ; \Psi  \vdash  \ottnt{E_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \multimap  \ottnt{E_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%
{\ottdruleEXXimpIName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleEXXimpEName}[0]{\ottdrulename{E\_impE}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleEXXimpE}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Theta_{{\mathrm{1}}} ; \Psi_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{E_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \multimap  \ottnt{E_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \quad   \Theta_{{\mathrm{2}}} ; \Psi_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{E_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  }%
}{
 \Theta_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Theta_{{\mathrm{2}}} ; \Psi_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Psi_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{E_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%
{\ottdruleEXXimpEName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleEXXchoiceContName}[0]{\ottdrulename{E\_choiceCont}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleEXXchoiceCont}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Theta ; \Psi  \vdash  \ottnt{T} }%
}{
 \Theta ; \Psi  \vdash  \ottsym{(}   \ottnt{T}  \sqcup  \ottnt{T}   \ottsym{)}  \multimapboth  \ottnt{T} }{%
{\ottdruleEXXchoiceContName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleEXXchoiceSymName}[0]{\ottdrulename{E\_choiceSym}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleEXXchoiceSym}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Theta ; \Psi  \vdash   \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \sqcup  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }%
}{
 \Theta ; \Psi  \vdash  \ottsym{(}   \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \sqcup  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \ottsym{)}  \multimapboth  \ottsym{(}   \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \sqcup  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \ottsym{)} }{%
{\ottdruleEXXchoiceSymName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleEXXchoiceAssocName}[0]{\ottdrulename{E\_choiceAssoc}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleEXXchoiceAssoc}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Theta ; \Psi  \vdash   \ottsym{(}   \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \sqcup  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \ottsym{)}  \sqcup  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{3}}}}  }%
}{
 \Theta ; \Psi  \vdash  \ottsym{(}   \ottsym{(}   \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \sqcup  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \ottsym{)}  \sqcup  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{3}}}}   \ottsym{)}  \multimapboth  \ottsym{(}   \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \sqcup  \ottsym{(}   \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \sqcup  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{3}}}}   \ottsym{)}   \ottsym{)} }{%
{\ottdruleEXXchoiceAssocName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleEXXdistParaName}[0]{\ottdrulename{E\_distPara}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleEXXdistPara}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Theta ; \Psi  \vdash   \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \odot  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \rhd  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{3}}}}  \ottsym{)}  }%
}{
 \Theta ; \Psi  \vdash  \ottsym{(}   \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \odot  \ottsym{(}   \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \sqcup  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{3}}}}   \ottsym{)}   \ottsym{)}  \multimapboth  \ottsym{(}   \ottsym{(}   \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \odot  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \ottsym{)}  \sqcup  \ottsym{(}   \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \odot  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{3}}}}   \ottsym{)}   \ottsym{)} }{%
{\ottdruleEXXdistParaName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleEXXdistSeqName}[0]{\ottdrulename{E\_distSeq}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleEXXdistSeq}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Theta ; \Psi  \vdash  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rhd  \ottsym{(}   \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \sqcup  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{3}}}}   \ottsym{)} }%
}{
 \Theta ; \Psi  \vdash  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rhd  \ottsym{(}   \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \sqcup  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{3}}}}   \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{)}  \multimapboth  \ottsym{(}   \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rhd  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \sqcup  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rhd  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{3}}}}  \ottsym{)}   \ottsym{)} }{%
{\ottdruleEXXdistSeqName}{}%
}}

\ottusedrule{\ottdruleEXXvar{}}

\ottusedrule{\ottdruleEXXparaI{}}

\ottusedrule{\ottdruleEXXimpI{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleEXXimpE{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleEXXchoiceCont{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleEXXchoiceSym{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleEXXchoiceAssoc{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleEXXdistPara{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleEXXdistSeq{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}
